transcript.title: Message to his Royal Highness and Mrs Parker-Bowles
transcript.content:
On behalf of the Government and people of Australia, I should like to convey the very warmest congratulations on the occasion of your wedding and our best wishes for a long and happy future together.

It was a great pleasure to welcome you, Your Royal Highness, to Australia again recently. The strength of your feeling for our country was clearly evident during your visit, and was reflected in the warmth of the welcome you received.

I hope that we will be able to welcome you both in the future.
